info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 18 at 3:11PM MDT until May 18 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Denver CO
info.description:
TORBOU
The National Weather Service in Denver has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Northwestern Morgan County in northeastern Colorado... East Central Weld County in northeastern Colorado...
* Until 345 PM MDT.
* At 311 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles north of Weldona, or 17 miles northwest of Fort Morgan, moving northeast at 20 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado and ping pong ball size hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* Locations impacted include... New Raymer.
info.instruction: Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a well-built building away from windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 3:45 PM MDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 3:45 PM MDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 3:45 PM MDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 3:45 PM MDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
